simple_case.description: Simple case with moderate difference in proportions
simple_case.note: Group 1: 5 successes out of 15 (33%). Group 2: 8 successes out of 15 (53%)

large_difference.note: Group 1: 1 success out of 10 (10%). Group 2: 9 successes out of 10 (90%)

small_samples.note: Group 1: 2 successes out of 5 (40%). Group 2: 4 successes out of 5 (80%)

all_success_group1.note: Group 1: 5 successes out of 5 (100%). Group 2: 2 successes out of 5 (40%)

rare_event.note: Group 1: 1 success out of 100 (1%). Group 2: 5 successes out of 100 (5%)
